channel.title: Electromagnetics on Daniel Dominguez Chavez
channel.description: Recent content in Electromagnetics on Daniel Dominguez Chavez

item.title: Microstrip Simulation
item.description: Project Specifications This is a MATLAB and MATLAB app builder project. It was part of ECEN 445, an elective course in Applied Electromagnetics. The mathematical concept is an exercise in recursive methods. There is a layout of nodes on an X and Y plane. The Z plane is the measure of Potential in volts. In the middle, there is a simulated microstrip line that reaches about halfway into the viewable area.
